law.catch_line: Annual leave that is forfeited under §§ 9-304 and 9-306 of this subtitle is placed, unless the emp...
law.text: Annual leave that is forfeited under §§ 9-304 and 9-306 of this subtitle is placed, unless the employee objects, in the State Employees' Leave Bank established by § 9-602(a)(1) of this title.
